data.body:
Same look, different experiences!
We have updated the whole website under the hood.
By using RxJS in the app, everything will be up-to-date with your actions.
list: New effect: Add loading spinners in views and action buttons
Fix bug: Reload on Logging out
Fix bug: pagination not working properly
Fix bug: Navigate to the user's profile
Fix some more bugs and improve user experiences
data.author: LinhDV5

data.body: Now you can save your article to draft when you haven't finish it yet. You can publish it anytime after that. Save Draft also prevents any errors occur when publishing your newest article. Draft will be loaded right when you are back to Online and the content will be loaded on New Article like there's nothing happened before that.
list: Save Draft is intergrated in "New Article" and "Edit Article"
Draft after published successful is only available to edit again in "Edit Article"

links.label: Try our new feature - Save Draft HERE

data.author: LinhDV5
